title: Remote Anatomy Simulation-Based Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Anatomy education course using VR/simulation for elementary school teachers. Establishing a non-face-to-face collaborative learning environment in a BYOD setting

learning_goals: Learners accurately identify the 3D spatial relationships of the human head and neck structures through VR simulation with over 90% accuracy.
Learners complete over 80% of a lesson design plan linked to the elementary curriculum through scientific explanations using anatomical terminology.
Learners engage in critical thinking-based participation at least four times in anatomy case analysis discussions using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
